Title: Mens Rotary chronograph blue leather strap watch GS00199/05
Description: chapelle_jewellery Visit our eBay Shop Add us to your Favourites list > Subscribe to our Newsletter > About Chapelle Delivery The Chapelle Guarantee Mens Rotary chronograph blue leather strap watch GS00199/05 RRP £149.00 Now £99.00 Description This mens Rotary chronograph watch has sporty styling with a deep blue coloured leather strap and dial and contrasting silver tone detailing. The large round stainless steel casing measures 45mm in diameter including the crown and houses the blue face which has three sub-dials and a date window. The hands and major hour markers are luminous to glow in the dark. The stopwatch feature can be actioned by the push buttons to the right hand side of the watch and the 24 hour time and date can be changed by using the screw down crown. To the left hand side of the casing is a crown that can be twisted to rotate the inner bezel for the Tachymeter feature. With mineral glass protecting the face and water resistant to Rotary’s Dolphin standard this watch can be worn with confidence. It comes complete with a Rotary lifetime manufacturer’s warranty which covers the internal working parts and is valid when the watch is serviced by Rotary every three years.
